code: var getDateFormat=function getDateFormat(date){var d=new Date(date);return d.toDateString()+" | "+formatAMPM(d);};function formatAMPM(date){var hours=date.getHours();var minutes=date.getMinutes();var ampm=hours>=12?"PM":"AM";hours=hours%12;hours=hours?hours:12;minutes=minutes<10?"0"+minutes:minutes;var strTime=hours+":"+minutes+" "+ampm;return strTime;}var getCustomerAddress=function getCustomerAddress(data){try{return data.pretty_address;}catch(_unused){return null;}};var getDeliveryAgentName=function getDeliveryAgentName(data){try{return data.profile_name+"-"+data.user_profile.phone;}catch(_unused2){return null;}};var getDateEpoch=function getDateEpoch(date){return Date.parse(date);};export{getCustomerAddress,getDateFormat,getDeliveryAgentName,getDateEpoch};
